items.title: SQL for Marketers

visible_instructors.title: Justin Mares
visible_instructors.job_title: Traction Book author, growth at Airbrake/Exceptional
visible_instructors.name: Justin

items.headline: Learn How to Write SQL Queries and Conduct Data Analysis
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to write SQL queries as well as any developer.
By the end of this course, you'll understand what SQL is and how you can harness it to become a better marketer.
You'll have plug and play code snippets that will allow you to use SQL immediately to gather data about your customers.
